content.title: Lex Reception
description: As a Justia Connect member, you are eligible for a special offer helping you save on the legal answering service dedicated to helping people and the planet. Not only can you get $100 off your second month of services, but the company donates 1% of its earnings each month to protect endangered species.

content.title: Lifestyle Savings
description: Protect your furry friends and save on unexpected vet bills with a discount on Pets Best insurance. Courtesy of your Justia Connect membership, you may be eligible for savings of 5% on Best Benefit plans.
